abilities.desc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place, and providing vision in a 250 radius.
abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.notes: Trees created by Sprout have the same interactions with abilities as regular trees.

abilities.desc: Teleports to any point on the map.
abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.notes: When the cast begins, an effect is created at the target location, which is visible to allies and enemies.

abilities.desc: Converts an area of trees into Treants under the command of Nature's Prophet.
abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.notes: Nature's Call can only create as many treants as there are trees in the target area.

abilities.desc: Applies a curse on all enemy heroes within 1200 range, displaying them in fog, slowing them, and causing damage over time based on the number of trees within 250 radius. Treants count as trees for this purpose.
abilities.name: Curse of the Oldgrowth

abilities.desc: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage. Enemies that die under this spell grant you bonus damage for 50.0 seconds.
abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.notes: Can be cast through the minimap; the nearest valid target will be selected.
